Title: ExHtmlEditor - Express WYSIWYG HTML Visual Editor
Description: A tool for learning and writing HTML. Get instant visual effect side by side with your code as you type. Support HTML5, Javascript and CSS3 elements.

We have moved to new site. This site is no more maintained. Please visit new site at: https://github.com/adriancs2/ExHtmlEditor . Thanks.

Project Description
A tool for learning and writing HTML, Javascript and CSS. Get instant visual effect side by side with your code as you type. Support HTML5, Javascript and CSS3 elements.







Features:

  • Support HTML5, Javascript and CSS3 elements.
  • Visual rendering output is displayed instantly side by side with HTML codes.
  • HTML Syntax highlighting.
  • Codes searching and replacing.
  • Portable, no installation needed.
  • Auto-Complete
  • Auto-Indentation with previous line.
  • Able to fold/collapse and expand code block.

Acknowledgements
ExHtmlEditor is built on top of the following technologies / components:

  • Advance HTML Renderer - Awesomium - awesomium.com, awesomium.codeplex.com
  • Text Editor - ScintillaNET - scintillanet.codeplex.com
  • C# Programming Language
  • Main IDE - Visual Studio - microsoft.com/visualstudio


Learn HTML, Javascript and CSS

  • W3Schools.com - Free HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, XML, ASP.NET, PHP, and SQL tutorials with lots of working examples and source code.

Other Utilities

  • Color Cop - A free multi-purpose color picker for Windows
